Name: Frank & Lydia's Ijssalon
Review Text: Just ordered delivery from them. They were super sweet , they provided something extra because a flavor was finished. Thank you! You made our office very happy

Name: Frank & Lydia's Ijssalon
Review Text: Very creamy texture and a great variety to chose from! I was pleasantly surprised because the shop doesn't look like quality but the product certainly is!

Name: Frank & Lydia's Ijssalon
Review Text: Super friendly staff 2 ice cream balls 2.50 super creamy and not so sweet just on the right spot,  guess who's going there everyday for the next 5 days

Name: Frank & Lydia's Ijssalon
Review Text: Good ice cream, decent espresso, fries are ok I guess - though don't expect anything handcut or fried twice.
